## Library used to clean the data
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(janitor)
```

## Getting the data from Github 
```{r}
url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Kristian2828/pfds_group_project/main/dataset/dataset.csv"
```

## Exploring raw data 
```{r}
library(dplyr)
df1 = read.csv(url)
glimpse(df1)
nrow(na.omit(df1))
nrow(df1[!complete.cases(df1), ])
any(is.na(df1))
summary(df1)
```

## Format variable names
```{r}
library(janitor)
df2 = clean_names(df1)
View(df2)
```

## Dropping unnessary variables
```{r}
df2 = df1[-c(112:147)]
View(df2)
```

## Replacing all missing values, "" with NA 
```{r}
cname = names(df2)
for (i in cname) {
  print(paste(i, sum(df2[i]=="")))
  df2[!is.na(df2[i])&df2[i]=="",i] <-NA
}
```
